snippet: It’s hard to find a state now that isn’t trying to capitalize on some sort of wine trail, but New Jersey, which has nearly 50 wineries statewide, offers several reasons for excitement.
abstract: Wineries continue to open in New Jersey, following passage of direct shipping law; there are now 50 wineries statewide, with $35 million in annual sales, making New Jersey seventh-largest wine-producing state.
lead_paragraph: It’s hard to find a state now that isn’t trying to capitalize on some sort of wine trail, but New Jersey, which has nearly 50 wineries statewide, offers several reasons for excitement.

headline.seo: New Jersey Wineries, Like Auburn Road and Bellview
headline.main: From Garden State to Vineyard State
headline.print_headline: From Garden State To Vineyard State
